parameters.name: AliyunLang
parameters.description: The language. Valid values: zh and en. Default value: zh.

parameters.name: EnvironmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the environment instance.

parameters.name: ManagedType
parameters.description:
type of managed:
- none: not managed. default value of prometheus for ACK.
- agent: managed agent. default value of promehtues for ASK/ACS/AckOne.
- agent-exproter: maanged agent and exporter. default of prometheus for Cloud.
